document.query: CREATE TABLE `gt_banner_image` ( `id` BIGINT(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `banner_id` BIGINT(20) NOT NULL , `img_name` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL , `url` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL , `language` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL , `deleted` TINYINT(1) NOT NULL , `created_at` DATETIME NOT NULL , `updated_at` DATETIME NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE = InnoDB;
